emailTransform.cleanEmail:
Hi Jamie,

Thanks for your note. I reviewed the documents and updated the transaction timeline. Here is the latest status and next step:
• Appraisal scheduled for Thursday
• Disclosures delivered and acknowledged

I will follow up Friday with a confirmation.

Best,
Alex

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about RealtyClose

founder.question: Who is behind RealtyClose? What are the founder's credentials?
founder.answer:
RealtyClose is founded and led by Greg Blackburn, a product-focused technologist who has shipped customer-facing software and data workflows in highly regulated environments. Greg's experience spans CRM, workflow automation, and AI-assisted authoring tools used by professional teams.

What this means for you:
• Practical, operations-first design — the product is built around how real agents, TCs, and brokers actually work.
• Compliance and trust — workflows are designed to be auditable and policy-friendly from day one.
• Shipping discipline — we ship small, verifiable improvements frequently and document what's next.

Selected credentials & proof points:
• Track record building and scaling B2B software used by professionals.
• Led cross-functional teams across product, engineering, and go-to-market.
• Experience integrating with Google Workspace (Gmail/Calendar) and modern APIs.
• Strong focus on privacy, least-privilege permissions, and transparent roadmaps.

Verification & profiles:
• LinkedIn: Contact us for LinkedIn profile
• GitHub / Portfolio: Contact us for portfolio
• Contact: hello@zazatechnologies.com

whatIsRealtyClose.question: What is RealtyClose?
whatIsRealtyClose.answer: RealtyClose is a Gmail-first AI assistant designed specifically for real estate professionals. It helps you draft professional emails in seconds, track deals, and stay compliant - all without leaving Gmail.

howDoesItWork.question: How does RealtyClose work?
howDoesItWork.answer: RealtyClose integrates directly into your Gmail interface as a Chrome extension. When you're composing an email, our AI analyzes the context and suggests professional, compliance-ready responses. You can customize tone, add deal-specific details, and send polished emails in seconds.

whoIsItFor.question: Who is RealtyClose for?
whoIsItFor.answer: RealtyClose is built for all real estate professionals: solo agents, team leads, transaction coordinators, and brokerages. Whether you handle 2 deals a year or 200, our tools scale to help you communicate more efficiently.

pricingPlans.question: What are your pricing plans?
pricingPlans.answer: We offer three main plans: Free (5 drafts/month), Professional ($29/user/month), and Team ($49/user/month). Enterprise plans are available for brokerages with 50+ agents. All paid plans include a 7-day free trial.

freeTrialDetails.question: What's included in the free trial?
freeTrialDetails.answer: The 7-day free trial gives you full access to Professional features: unlimited AI drafts, smart templates, follow-up reminders, and compliance checking. No credit card required to start.

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access continues until the end of your billing period, and you can always downgrade to our free plan.

dataPrivacy.question: How do you handle my data?
dataPrivacy.answer: We take privacy seriously. RealtyClose operates within Gmail's security framework and follows bank-level encryption standards. We don't store your email content - our AI processes requests in real-time and discards them immediately.

compliance.question: Is RealtyClose compliant with real estate regulations?
compliance.answer: Yes, RealtyClose is designed with compliance in mind. Our templates include required disclosures, our audit logs track all communications, and broker oversight features ensure team compliance. However, you're always responsible for following your local regulations.

gmailSecurity.question: Is my Gmail data secure?
gmailSecurity.answer: Absolutely. RealtyClose uses OAuth 2.0 for secure Gmail access, requiring only the minimum permissions needed. We're SOC 2 compliant and your email data never leaves Google's servers except for real-time AI processing.

installation.question: How do I install RealtyClose?
installation.answer: Simply visit the Chrome Web Store, search for 'RealtyClose', and click 'Add to Chrome'. After installation, open Gmail and you'll see the RealtyClose panel in your sidebar. Sign in with your Google account and you're ready to go.

browserSupport.question: Which browsers are supported?
browserSupport.answer: Currently, RealtyClose is available as a Chrome extension. We're working on support for Edge and Firefox. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome.

mobileSupport.question: Does RealtyClose work on mobile?
mobileSupport.answer: Not yet, but mobile support is coming soon. Currently, RealtyClose works best on desktop/laptop computers using Chrome browser with Gmail.

crmIntegration.question: Does RealtyClose integrate with my CRM?
crmIntegration.answer: RealtyClose works alongside your existing CRM by operating within Gmail. We don't replace your CRM - we enhance your email communication. Direct CRM integrations are planned for future releases.

outlookSupport.question: Do you support Outlook?
outlookSupport.answer: Not currently. RealtyClose is built specifically for Gmail to provide the best possible integration. We may consider Outlook support in the future based on user demand.

teamManagement.question: How does team management work?
teamManagement.answer: Team plans include shared template libraries, role-based permissions, and centralized oversight. Team leads can approve templates, monitor usage, and ensure brand consistency across all team communications.

aiAccuracy.question: How accurate is the AI?
aiAccuracy.answer: Our AI is specifically trained on real estate communication patterns and achieves high accuracy for industry-specific content. However, you should always review and customize AI-generated content before sending.

customTemplates.question: Can I create custom templates?
customTemplates.answer: Yes! Professional and Team plans include custom template creation. You can build templates for common scenarios like listing updates, closing timelines, and client check-ins.

supportOptions.question: What support options are available?
supportOptions.answer: Free users get community support, Professional users get email support, and Team/Enterprise users get priority phone support. We also have extensive documentation and video tutorials.

contact.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
